metadata.name: Saito Family Villa
metadata.description:
'50mm Nihon' is a humble portrayal of Japan through a consistent series of captures taken during five weeks and two separate trips over a two year time period from 2016 to 2017.

Utilizing a Fujifilm X-T2 camera and a 50mm prime lens as the medium, this collection represents a surface-level insight into the local people, culture, art & architecture that compose Mainland Japan. This collection strives to recreate the feeling of experienced moments through a humanistic perspective.

All moments are captured in ultrahigh 5K resolution and include 'CC BY 4.0' rights of use with proper attribution for the Holder. All first time sales are eligible to receive a hardcover fine art book in addition to their photographic acquisition. All shots are original works by Alexander of Archonomous.
